comments.body:
The example uses `1T`, 

However later on you have
`module.fail_json(msg='size (Physical Capacity) should be defined in MB, GB, TB or PB units')`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@  size:
    description:
      - Volume size in MB, GB or TB units. See examples.
    required: false
  pool:
